thread.title: BRIEF-Asbury Automotive Group Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.81

title: BRIEF-Asbury Automotive Group Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.81
text:
41 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Asbury Automotive Group Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.81 Reuters Staff 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Asbury Automotive Group Inc: * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.81 * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.03 
* QTRLY NEW VEHICLES REVENUE $964.1 MILLION VERSUS $935.6 MILLION LAST YEAR 
* QTRLY TOTAL USED VEHICLES REVENUE $437.5 MILLION VERSUS $468.9 MILLION LAST YEAR 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.59 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $1,670.9 MILLION VERSUS $1,666.5 MILLION LAST YEAR * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $1.69 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* ASBURY AUTOMOTIVE - QTRLY NET INCOME WAS ADJUSTED FOR A $7.9 MILLION BENEFIT ($0.37 PER DILUTED SHARE) RELATED TO ADJUSTMENTS TO DEFERRED TAX BALANCES Source text: ( bit.ly/2E3yw5j )
